quotes.quote: There's no honorable way to kill, no gentle way to destroy. There is nothing good in war. Except its ending.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: If you take no risks you'll suffer no defeats, but if you take no risks you win no victories
quotes.author: Richard Nixon

quotes.quote: Only the dead have seen the end of war
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: The problem with giving up too soon is that's the only way that guarantees failure.
quotes.author: Dhar Mann

quotes.quote: A wise man can play the part of a clown, but a clown can't play the part of a wise man.
quotes.author: Malcolm X

quotes.quote: The way I see it, if you want to the rainbow, you gotta put up with the rain.
quotes.author: Dolly Parton

quotes.quote: All warfare is based on deception.
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.quote: Feel the sand beneath your toes. Feel the rain on your skin. Are you having fun yet?
quotes.author: Unknown
